value.title: Link Power BI to an Excel file in SharePoint Online
value.excerpt: In this vlog, we will learn how we can consume data from the Excel Online to Power BI. Our Excel file has been stored in the SharePoint Document Library.   We need to fetch the data from SharePoint Document Libraryâ€™s Excel file to Power BI Desktop. In this video, we will learn step by step procedure

value.title: Power BI Shows Incorrect Measure Total? How to fix it?

value.title: Are you backing up your Power BI Dataset???
value.excerpt: While Power BI is a SaaS service, backing up your dataset is still important. What if something was accidently deleted? How do you recover it? Patrick shows you how you can get a backup / restore process in place so you can sleep at night.  Backup/Restore PowerShell Script: https://guyinacu.be/backuprestorescript
